Quote: Beauty is a pattern that our minds recognize, but don't fully understand
Author: Me

Quote: There are no strangers here; Only friends you haven't yet met.
Author: William Butler Yeats

Quote: Follow your instincts. That is where true wisdom manifests itself.
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Quote: Life is like a sewer. What you get out of it depends on what you put into it.
Author: Tom Lehrer

Quote: Pure, holy simplicity confounds all the wisdom of this world and the wisdom of the flesh.
Author: Francis of Assisi
